website_summaries.verdict: A basic lawn mower that combines quality and a reasonable price. If you want a gas-powered mower without lots of bells and whistles, it's a sound choice.
pros: A traditional gas mower that's fairly lightweight and easy to use
The 140cc motor is powerful, yet it's not a gas-guzzler
cons: Not as rugged as costlier models
Occasionally chugs when cutting large, uneven yards, and wheels are hard to adjust

customer_reviews.title: A superb light mower
customer_reviews.text: Good little mower. I have a large yard full of trees and obstacles, plus another full lot of just lawn. I tend to let the grass in the empty lot get pretty deep but this mower hums right through even the thickest spots, and it's light and maneuverable so it doesn't wear me out getting to the tricky spots. Assembly was simple enough, and the starter pulls easily and has started first pull every time. For a no-frills, budget mower I couldn't ask for more.
customer_reviews.author: Tim is me

customer_reviews.title: If my wife can start it anyone can.
customer_reviews.text: Nice mower, fires up first or second time no problem. Cuts well. Very happy with the product. 2 feet tall grass not a problem.
customer_reviews.author: M. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: For the price, you can't beat it. My ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price, you can't beat it. My kids have been using it to mow MANY yards and they are hard on equipment. This thing has held up well and I think it will continue to. Sidenote: One of my bolts was bent which gave me issues building it, but they shipped me a new bolt, overnight, for free.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Maguire

customer_reviews.title: Ugh.
customer_reviews.text: Killed it after 3 uses on our small, but hilly yard. I shouldn't have to take it for repairs after three uses and 1 month of ownership.
customer_reviews.author: J. Nichols

customer_reviews.title: This little mower is great. Starts right up and mows through heavy growth
customer_reviews.text: This little mower is great. Starts right up and mows through heavy growth. Do wish it had adjustable height. Noticed Walmart has mowers for $140 that adjust in height. Be a lot easier to return to Walmart​ it you had a problem.
customer_reviews.author: D. Twigden

customer_reviews.title: WORST LAWNMOWER EVER
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely horrible. Putting the lawnmower together was horrible. Bolts and nuts were not lineing up, fitting probably. They were not tightening properly. The pull cord is stuck. Every single thing about this lawnmower has been a complete nightmare. I would not recommend this to ANYONE! THIS has been wasted money. We can't take it apart to sentd it back, we can't get ahold of support which the manual sayshours available M-F & hours for Saturday. They should get NEGATIVE STAR rating.
customer_reviews.author: Allison M. LeJeune

customer_reviews.title: Died in under 5 mo.
customer_reviews.text: We used it successfully for 2-3mo (about 1 mowing per week; small backyard and lawn), then it just quit working. We have no idea what is wrong with it. My husband tried (as suggested by the manual) to replace with fresh gas, clear out the fuel line, clean filter & check that the spark plug isn't loose. Nothing seems to work. Maybe someone with mechanical knowledge could figure out how to fix it, but the fix is beyond regular lay person's abilities. A total waste of money for us.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Great for a small yard!
customer_reviews.text: I have a very small yard. I am a 50 something female that mows her own yard and needed something that is easy to push in small spaces and easy to start. Love this mower. It starts very easy and is very light and small enough to get in tight spots! I have been very pleased. I put it together myself. Directions were pretty clear. I had to read through them a couple of times to get what they meant and I am good at directions. If you are not good with directions, I suggest you get someone to help you with it. Not very many steps!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this mower a couple months ago and have only used it 3 times. Now, I cannot even get it started. It seemed like such a great deal and I read really good reviews. I am beyond frustrated that it stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Charis

customer_reviews.title: I'm very disappointed that I could never get it to turn over ...
customer_reviews.text: I want to acknowledge that I really wanted this mower to work. I'm very disappointed that I could never get it to turn over once. I like buying bottom of the line, inexpensive machines and seeing how long I can make them last by taking care of them. However, I was not going to replace spark plugs and fool with the fuel system on a brand new mower. I thought it smarter to return it and at least get my gift card. Maybe I just got a lemon but, regardless, it does leave a sour taste. :(
customer_reviews.author: High Desert Photog

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money on this !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have a small dog pen. I bought this mower to mow it. Approx 20’ X 10’. FIRST TIME I used this mower, when I pulled it back to change directions the back plastic guard went underneath the mower and got all chopped to hell. First used on May 25 2020, today July 21 went to go use it and the motor is locked up and will not let me pull the pull cord, then I notice the pull cord is frayed close to the engine, bare wire showing. This is less than two months old and used maybe six times. It has been kept inside the whole time. What a huge disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, simple design, runs great , cuts great..... MYGA....making yards great again!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this after my well used old Murray died for the last time.. and the tremendous rains we had in late August and September in north Texas, made my grass keep growing faster and faster. This little mower was easy to assemble, and it starts on the first pull EVERY TIME!! Nothing fancy, and it's fairly light duty....but cuts nicely. Just finished mowing my one acre yard....like a champ!! Seems quieter than most lawnmowers. But I will be running it dry to store for the winter...I think this is my last mowing until April of 2019.
customer_reviews.author: TX Sasquatch

customer_reviews.title: Overall A Good Lawn Mower
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a red, or so I thought, and a black one arrived. I am good with that. I will say it was not easy to put together as I had never used a socket wrench but once I figured it out - it became easier. As for the motor, I am use to a Briggs N Stratton as it fired up on first pull - this one requires several pulls even after hitting the primer button a few times. It does a good job mowing. I put the wheels on to “medium” hole as it does not have adjustment handles and its perfect setting. All and all this gets the job done nicely
customer_reviews.author: CA Barbour

customer_reviews.title: Gave out the third 3 mowing due to "bad oil" oil used was provided by MTD
customer_reviews.text: It worked splendidly for the two times I got to use it... The third time I pulled to start it I heard a clank and it wouldn't start. I took it to a local service area and was informed a part was not "well lubricated " and punched a hole in the engine block, and the oil in the machine was peculiar. The only oil I used was provided by MTD when I bought it, and of course, these damages will not be covered by their warranty. I am incredibly disappointed with this, I've had a Briggs & Stratton for over about a decade and never encountered something like this. It seems I will need to find a new brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight easy to use. Only has a 132cc engine.
customer_reviews.text: Received this push mower via UPS in good condition. Easy to assemble. Instructions were clear. You will need a long funnel to fill the oil tank. Started on first pull. Has good power and cut grass well. It's very light and easy to handle. In tall grass the side chute got clogged once but cleared itself fairly quick. My only complaint is that the mower is advertised with a 140cc engine but mine is clearly labeled as 132cc.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time. Go to Walmart.
customer_reviews.text: Recieved it bent to where the wheel cant even turn and it teeter totters once set upright. It's heavy and was a pain to hold and put the wheels and bar on. Now I have to ship it back to get a refund. I didn't get a replacement because after 2 weeks of being on hold with the manufacturer for almost an hour I gave up.
customer_reviews.author: CMathis

customer_reviews.title: Started off good..now it doesn't work. Very angry
customer_reviews.text: It stated off good but when I went to mow the yard this time it wouldn't start. Checked the oil and it was still full and had a good bit of gas. Got it to come on but went one line down and it shut off again. Tried again same results..4th time I tried to start it...it started to smoke real bad and quickly turned it off. So safe to stay I have to buy ANOTHER mower.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Madden

customer_reviews.title: Positives - Good size for my yard
customer_reviews.text: Positives - Good size for my yard. Like the Vintage look. Decent Cut. It does the job! Negatives - Not much to select from grass height cut. And this machine is a PAIN to start!!!! It takes a good 10 mins to get it running!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Edward Cyr

customer_reviews.title: The Little engine that can!
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly Even though the lower push bar that attaches to the Frame was far from an inch, had to bend the bar just a little To attach the screws But no big deal. Overall great little lawn mower. Went through almost knee high grass with no problem. Even came with 10-30w oil. Started on 1st pull !!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Died after 7 uses and in 7 weeks, and amazon only has a 30 day return policy on this item! You also cant adjust the height after you mount the wheels. Stay away from this junk, you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Next time I will not shop on line for an inexpensive mower. Pictures won't show it's cheapness or I'd take many. The blade ribs against mower base. The wheel bolts are improperly sized. I'd have returned it but the motor for on my old mower base with out running again the edges of the blade. Horrible purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Davis

customer_reviews.title: Run great, light weight but needs easier deck adjustment.
customer_reviews.text: The assembly was painstaking during some parts and I do not like that the wheels are not easily raised or lowered, but otherwise works great. The machine started right up on first use and every time after for about 4 months. Beware of packaging, mine arrived with a conpromised oil container that would have leaked all over my card if I hadn't coincidentally taken it out- I would suggest to the manufacturer to ship a better vessel for the complementary oil if they wanted to include it.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Hennessey

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: My old Sears keep giving me trouble. I added up all the repairs and decided it is cheaper to get this one and just hope it lasts a while. So far it starts fine, cuts well, and is light to push. I did have a few issues in assembly as it must have been really shook up in shipment. A few wires were bent so it would not start at first until I got a pliers and straighten things out.
customer_reviews.author: Bluecat

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money or time.
customer_reviews.text: Not put together like youtube shows. Not easily put together. The flange nuts have rubber stoppers and won't tighten.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Works well BUT
customer_reviews.text: Mower works well and is easy to start. Two negatives: even though it is technically adjustable the wheels must be removed in order to make that adjustment. Not something you want to do in the middle of mowing a yard. The gas tank is extremely small and even though I don’t use the mower on a large area I always have to fill up before I finish mowing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Rocca

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the trouble
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lawn mower for my small yard space and it broke down on the third use. Amazon was kind enough to send me a replacement but that lawn mower fell apart as well.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Noble

customer_reviews.title: Not terrible for the money
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was pretty quick, set up took a few hand tools and about 45 mins, started up and ran fine, the only big complaint is that the blade was hitting the inside of the deck. After a few smacks with a hammer I was able to fix the issue, but so far so good it's serving the purpose I bought it for. Would NOT recommend this to anyone with a medium to large yard who mows weekly, not that it doesn't do the job, it's just cheap and not super high quality so rough use would kill it quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly with a capable assistant to hold mower while you mount the wheels. Cranks easily with bulb primer. The handles were basically thrown in the box and scratched the deck paint; I contacted MTD, and they promptly sent me a can of matching spray paint. I think it is a good mower for the money, and I like having an engine that is not a Briggs.
customer_reviews.author: SCsenior

customer_reviews.title: Works great  and highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to mow under our fruit trees in our garden and by our driveway where the drain culvert won't let the riding mower in, and have also mowed some grass that was a little tall in some spots. Bought in 2015, 5 years later and it's still running good definitely was worth the money and worth waiting for the delivery and way cheaper than buying at a garden center or local hardware store would definitely buy again and recommend if your looking for a mower for yourself or for your kids to mow with.
customer_reviews.author: jason randall

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: I gave this mower at least one star because assembly was pretty straight forward and easy. Everything lined up and fit. All the hardware was there. However, after putting oil and gas in, I have yet to get it started after 2 days. There it sets. I have been mowing yards and dealing with mowers for over 50 years. I went through all the trouble-shooting tips plus some of my own. Still, there it sets. Expensive paper weight.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Richards

customer_reviews.title: It does the trick but I really would have wished ...
customer_reviews.text: It does the trick but I really would have wished I spent more money for one that had adjustable height. Other than that it is worth the money. Just wished i could adjust on the fly. It takes about 10 minutes to change all the wheels with a ratchet set.
customer_reviews.author: Seth K.

customer_reviews.title: scary
customer_reviews.text: This lawnmower starts on first or second try and cuts really well...the problem is that when you try to pull it backwards the rubber flap on the back goes under the lawnmower and hits the blades...cutting the rubber piece and making awful racket which almost makes you pee your pants
customer_reviews.author: mimmy

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: my mower died after 2 months Please do not buy this brand, wasting money
customer_reviews.author: Costa Chertakovsky

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This mower lasted about a month before it began to continually die on me. I couldn't mow my front and back lawns on the same day because the mower would die before completing the first yard. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Lani

customer_reviews.title: equipped with weaker 132cc OHV engine
customer_reviews.text: Machine arrived in good condition, however the unit was delivered with 132cc engine and not with advertised "durable 140cc OHV engine" Mower is loud but works. The wheels height is adjustable with the screws and you have to dissemble the wheels to readjust the height.
customer_reviews.author: Stalimir

customer_reviews.title: NOT HAPPY
customer_reviews.text: Hard to Assemble..... Had to Pay a Professional to put it together and he had a hard time starting it, finally got it running. Tried to mow one month later and it will not start, the Plunger on the side is broke.......cheap rubber Parts! 170.00’s worth of junk!
customer_reviews.author: LeAnna Kimball

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Hard-Working Little Mower!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little mower! I bought it to trim areas too large for a string trimmer---and I was sick of the string trimmer's lithium batteries running out after little use---and this little gem works like a charm! It is the perfect size for the work I need it for, and while it's lightweight, it does not feel cheap. It cuts through some pretty heavy duty weedy stuff with no problem. The whole area I mowed looked nice & neat when I was done. Starts right up easily. No complaints and I am very satisfied with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Monster
customer_reviews.text: This is a beast in a tiny package 10 stars! minor assembly required, you will need a ratchet set. wheels adist 3 SET levels (i would install them in the lowest slot for the longest cut, as the lowest cut will make your grass look terrible). came with oil, have used it over 10 times, no issues. starts up first time, evey time.
customer_reviews.author: Kremlax

customer_reviews.title: Good, light weight mower but wrenches of all sizes are a must!
customer_reviews.text: I received my mower yesterday and a friend of mine who has a large tool box with wrenches of all sizes put it together for me. Just a word of advise to any one who doesn't have lots of different sizes of wrenches and is not great at following directions, you will need help. It took him over an hour to complete it, put in the oil and gas and test it. It works very well and it is light and perfect for me as I have small lawns front and back and will be the "mower".
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Kaye

customer_reviews.title: For the price this was a score! It gets ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price this was a score! It gets the job done, however the metal must be a little bent because when the lawn mower is in the garage one of the wheels is floating in the air. This doesn't mater much to me as our yard isn't level but just shows that you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Broken after a month.
customer_reviews.text: The mower did a pretty good job the first mow. After that, the mower started having issues starting. It struggles to cut grass and constantly needs to be restarted. Oil is leaking out of the exhaust. I would not recommend this product. If you do purchase this product, I hope you everything works out good. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great mower!
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of power and yet small enough to cut in tight places. I love this mower because it's just simple and yet very effective with a great cut. Everything you need is in the box. Grab one for the price before spring hits. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Warren

customer_reviews.title: ... 20 inch push mower) was brand new It started easily. It is not even a year old now
customer_reviews.text: When it ( Yard Machine 140cc 20 inch push mower) was brand new It started easily. It is not even a year old now ,It will start, but won't run. My mechanic, said it is not worth fixing because it won't continue to run and will develop the same problem with the carborator/
customer_reviews.author: Will Howard

customer_reviews.title: Good mower but customer support is sorely lacking.
customer_reviews.text: It seem to be a good basic mower. But when I did have a problem after 8 months later I was not able to get through to tech support. I tried 2 calls and was on hold for over 20 min each time without getting through. Then I tried web support I went through the questions then was told I was 15th in line. After 50 minutes I was down to 4th in line so I went to get some water and 3 minute later got back to find that they had come on and left so I did not get to chat with anyone. Not a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this mower
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this mower March of 2017. Used it thru May 3017 then it stopped working. Had it in the shop 5 times then gave up and put it on the curb. Save your money and time and buy a better lawn mower.
customer_reviews.author: S reed scroggins

customer_reviews.title: Good Basic Mower
customer_reviews.text: I knew that I would have to put the mower together somewhat, but was surprised at the amount of work it required. I did not have the appropriate wrenches so I had to hire a handyman to finish putting it together. Mower works well now that it is together, but it seems like some of this could have been pre-assembled to make it a bit easier for the normal homeowner.
customer_reviews.author: twa1460

customer_reviews.title: Good cheap mower. Super light weight.
customer_reviews.text: Started right up. Cut 4 times now. Works good. Assembly of wheels rough since I did not have right size socket wrench. Had to use 2 wrenches and was tough but did it. No tools of any kind included. This thing is super light weight and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Nobody

customer_reviews.title: Good for about 4 times...then takes a crap
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lawnmower in May. It worked for about 4 times then today, August 6th, it cut off and now will not start. For some reason its not getting gas. We have tried everything and at this point I am very disappointed with this lawnmower. There is no gas is the float bowl and it should be filled. If your gonna sell a cheap lawnmower at least make sure it will work for more then 4 times. I have had no other issues with my purchases and have purchased from you many times but this makes me so unhappy and will not be buying big items like this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mower is about as I expected so good there. Disappointed in customer service
customer_reviews.text: Mower is about as I expected so good there. Disappointed in customer service. Bars are about 1.5 inches too wide which may or may not be what they should be. I called to ask and was disconnected twice. Then I got a hold of someone who transferred me and I waited for 20 minutes. Finally I gave up and just attached them which did work. Just very poor customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to assemble even though instructions are vague at times. If not real mechanical may want some assistance in assembly.. Once put together fired of on second pull. Once started using would crank on one pull.. Easy pull at that. Cut lawn fine and had no issues. Small width of blade housing would limit yard size. Overall good mower.
customer_reviews.author: donald hasty

customer_reviews.title: good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly pleased with this purchase. Starts easily right away. Runs well. It is a bare bones basic mower. No frills. It lacks easy wheel height adjustment. You must remove wheels to adjust to one of three heights. Not a problem for me. Surprisingly decent quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: D. Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last one season.
customer_reviews.text: Not only did it not even last one season, it only lasted for about 10 uses before it blew a seal and seized during light use. Total junk.
customer_reviews.author: tech geek inc

customer_reviews.title: Sweet mowah
customer_reviews.text: Works awesome so far! Assembly was pretty easy but i recommend lining up the handle loosely before attaching the rear wheels. When the wheels are at the lowest setting they could interfere with the handle and you won't be able to bolt the wheels on. Also some of the stickers are a pain to peel off if you don't like a million warning labels on your power equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Steinkamp

customer_reviews.title: Fix the blade and it works great
customer_reviews.text: We had to fix the blade which did not make me happy at all. Might want to make sure you are checking those things because other consumers will not be so understanding. Runs and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara K.

customer_reviews.title: Great mower
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use, light weight, no heavy pushing, it’s a grand mower! Well worth the small price. I’ve been pushing lawn mowers over 55 years, this one is the easiest to push yet.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Man

customer_reviews.title: I have had this mower for a couple of seasons and it is great to get those places you just can't get with ...
customer_reviews.text: I needed an inexpensive finish mower. I have had this mower for a couple of seasons and it is great to get those places you just can't get with riding tmower. lightweight and easy to store. Once you prime it 4-5 times, it starts every time on the first pull. Great product and was delivered to my front door.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Bonus
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine for the cost. Does the job with great power, ease, and super light. The only bummer is i can’t adjust the height levels with just a lever. I have to manually remove the wheels and adjust. I have them in the middle cut which is a good height.
customer_reviews.author: Ramazon

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This mower has such good value for the cost. I recently bought a new house (after renting for 10 years) and I was worried about the expense of even having a small yard. Definitely alleviated that concern. Side Note: I would NOT recommend installing the deck on the lowest setting as recommended by the instructions..just a bit too low.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew J. Milbrandt

customer_reviews.title: For the price this is definitely a great buy. As with anything you must assemble yourself ...
customer_reviews.text: Read the reviews expecting a lackluster product. I had no trouble assembling it however. It started right up and ran well as expected. For the price this is definitely a great buy. As with anything you must assemble yourself anytime it doesn't work try going over the directions to see if you missed anything before you get upset.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All good (so far)
customer_reviews.text: Item was shipped and delivered promptly. Took less than an hour to assemble with simple tool (socket set was very helpful). Instructions were pretty good. It started on the first pull after pushing the primer only three times; I was impressed. It got decent reviews, so I hope it lasts a long long time. It is a very simple mower, with no frills, which is what I wanted. Only thing is that it was advertised as 140cc, but the engine is 132 cc..?
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Hitesman

customer_reviews.title: Be prepared to put this mower together.
customer_reviews.text: There were more parts to attach than just the handle. (The reviews said that the handle was all that had to be attached.) I had to wait for someone else to put it together for me. They mowed with it and loved that it was easy to maneuver. I consider this a good purchase so far.
customer_reviews.author: ernie

customer_reviews.title: Fairly easy to assemble with just one person - the only ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this mower to cut my front yard when my riding mower was in the shop. Fairly easy to assemble with just one person - the only thing I don't like about the mower is that you have to remove the wheels to adjust the cutting height. Cuts well, easy to push and does well.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Vandergrift

customer_reviews.title: Not a good mower
customer_reviews.text: P.O.S. Worked good for the 1st use, then started getting gas in the piston cylinder and flooding so bad straight gas would come out of the muffler when I pulled the cord. Because the piston cylinder was so full of gas I could barely pull the cord which ended up tearing out of the housing.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Won't stay started and was a pain the rear to put together! *Returning. I will say I did like the look of it, just wish it had worked!
customer_reviews.author: HeatherLove

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I use a rider, but needed a cheap mower for the tight spots. Put it together added oil and gas. Started on the first pull. Can't complain about anything. Good value
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Mead

customer_reviews.title: Good mower
customer_reviews.text: Great mower for the cost in it...wish the tires were adjustable without having to take them completely off. That’s my only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: S. Grady

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Cuts grass evenly has last about two cuttings been using it about twice a week lately with all this rain glad I purchased no issues or problems brought last year and running great starts up with one pull just wish it was self propelled but very easy to maneuver also
customer_reviews.author: Niken

customer_reviews.title: Very easy start, smooth run
customer_reviews.text: It has exceeded my expectations. Very easy start, smooth run, even fun. I am disabled and I read reviewa, very helpful, and found this machine to be the easiest for me and I am having fun as I mow.
customer_reviews.author: Lorna Cedarwolf

customer_reviews.title: Defective / Returned
customer_reviews.text: The mower arrived as was promised and easy to set up. it is black instead of red but I prefer that. my only problem is I am unable to get it started after a few hours of trying. fresh gas new oil never been ran spark plug seems fine. Disassembled and Returned
customer_reviews.author: John B Elmer

customer_reviews.title: Goes above and beyond
customer_reviews.text: I have had this lawnmower for a couple years now and it still starts on the first pull. It was easy to put together. Easy to maneuver and very easy to operate. I am still amazed that after 100's of uses it still starts up on the first try.
customer_reviews.author: evon

customer_reviews.title: Comparative to shopping at the store without leaving home.
customer_reviews.text: Price and quality is great if you're willing to wait a bit and I didn't have to leave home to get it. I really like the bigger push button. Helps a lot if you have dexterity problems.
customer_reviews.author: Lady K

customer_reviews.title: Arrived defective
customer_reviews.text: -Mower is not listed as requiring assembly. The mower needs to be assembled and requires a socket kit. -Wheels are only adjustable if completely removed and put on a new height. - Needed to purchase a socket wrench kit to assemble. Had a lot of difficulty so I paid someone to assemble. Mower came with a defective engine and I am now expected to dissassemble and ship back. Not worth the time or money, spend the few extra dollars on a better model!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Will buy used/like new again
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Used/Like new is a great bargain on Amazon. I will purchase another when in need. This mower runs great, is in as new condition and starts first time every time!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Stark

customer_reviews.title: If there is a vague description, run
customer_reviews.text: Missing hardware. Mower description was vague. Assumed that the mower would mulch, wrong. An adjuster bar to move the wheels, actually have to unscrew the wheels. To add oil the plug is low on the base requirement is a funnel. $170 for a $100 mower. I wish I could return it.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Scarlett

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing quality control
customer_reviews.text: Ordered red but they sent black and then the primer bulb was defective and had a hole in it so no suction was created. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Noelle Kuder

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, but effective.
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what my husband needed. It is much lighter, and easier to maneuver, than his old one, but still cuts well.
customer_reviews.author: M. Artus

customer_reviews.title: Great value, easy assembely
customer_reviews.text: Pretty fast shipping, will need a few sockets and wrenches, all standard (not metric) comes with 4stroke oil, uses the whole container. Assembely is strait foward just the wheels, handle, and add oil then boom ready to go. Came in black, id recomend a high temp clear coat as the paint is already peeling (cheap paint) but thats it, pretty nice lil machine
customer_reviews.author: craig b.

customer_reviews.title: It does what I need it to do.
customer_reviews.text: Using to mow about an acre. I changed the oil after the break in time and so far all is well. This runs better than my last mower.
customer_reviews.author: SirKingPin

customer_reviews.title: small lawn mower
customer_reviews.text: Small lawn mower had me scarred it would be to small have to push harder because it's a small mower.. with that said it has held up well and got the job done I've used may by 5 or 6 times if i had a chance to but a different one i would because of how small it is
customer_reviews.author: Joey D

customer_reviews.title: it is great
customer_reviews.text: I am a woman so it is wonderful, because it is light weight, easy to start and push, it has paid for itself already. The instruction were okay putting it together took less than 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice mower for price
customer_reviews.text: nice little mower for price. Only downside is dragging backwards flap has solid bar that will wedge under it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: I've had this mower for almost a year, and it hasn't let me down yet. I put it together myself within an hour or so. It's withstood high grass, outside elements, and I haven't been disappointed. If you need a reliable, basic mower that won't break the bank, this is the one for you.
customer_reviews.author: jayamama

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: This lawn mower was delivered on a Sunday, put together quickly and took no time to get it up and running. It runs well and have no problems with it. We are very happy with this lawnmower
customer_reviews.author: Cherrie Archer

customer_reviews.title: It is very easy to maneuver.
customer_reviews.text: So far I like this product. What I would suggest though is in the directions to identify the bolts. I spent way too much time trying to figure out which one to use. Perhaps a number or color would help. For the price I think this mower is a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Made it through its first year. Good mower, took an hour to put together but was fun. Using shelf stable gas. I hate to work on carburetors and cost like 20 for a gallon but will last five years. It powers through tall grass and sticks without a hiccup. I’m rough on this mower but it works great.
customer_reviews.author: John M.

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The mower works real well and is easy to assemble and starts with one pull. Not recommend for large yards. Go with something powered and with a wider cutting base.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: At least it runs.
customer_reviews.text: It takes forever to assemble. To adjust the height of the cut you must remove the wheels. The mower would be perfect if I were 5 years old. It's so short that I almost have to break my back bending over to try and push it.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Good little mower
customer_reviews.text: Instructions could be clearer! The different size screws are not labeled or identified in any way so you kinda have to guess
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie Brown

customer_reviews.title: Strong little mower
customer_reviews.text: Works well strong mower doesn't stall when grass is long and thick
customer_reviews.author: Bianca

customer_reviews.title: it never was in box also primer pump sucks air, and it never was in box
customer_reviews.text: used twice on 900sq ft lawn and hasn't worked since, took to Aa mower shop showed cover for carb is missing,it never was in box also primer pump sucks air, and it never was in box, I'm not good with engines so I didn't realize it was missing thought reason for running bad at first was because its new
customer_reviews.author: richard redden

customer_reviews.title: Great Low Priced Mower
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent low priced mower. It was easy to assemble with a couple of wrenches and a pair of pliers. The one thing that detracts from it is the difficulty in adjusting the height of the cut. I like to raise the deck for that last cutting in the fall and in order to do that I will have to remove the wheels and move them to another set of holes. Other than that I have no complaints at all. It is light and easy to push and starts on the first pull every time. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: BobC8949

customer_reviews.title: Great Mower
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little mower that started right up the first pull!
customer_reviews.author: Karen A. Hamlin

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: If I could give no stars that’s what I would do, I ordered the red one as picture showed and got a black one that I still can’t start.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mows well
customer_reviews.text: I needed a mower that was in and out of the truck all day. Light enough for that and enough power to cut grass. Used about 12 times so far and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Palmer

customer_reviews.title: pretty solid mower
customer_reviews.text: pretty solid mower and good price when compared...over a year, starts every time. Installation wasnt that big of deal.
customer_reviews.author: ROLAND P.

customer_reviews.title: Replaced a bent shaft on our old lawnmower
customer_reviews.text: Buying this mower was cheaper than buying a mower equal to our old one. I pulled the motor and placed it on a more expensive base. This saved me money.
customer_reviews.author: David Baker

customer_reviews.title: Used it once and it died. Do not buy this!
customer_reviews.text: I mowed my front and back yard once. It's been hot and dry so the grass didn't need to be cut for a few weeks. I got halfway through and it died. Now it won't stay running. Because it took a few weeks to break down, I'm outside the return window. Do not buy this pile of garbage. If you do decide to chance it, buy it from somewhere that has a better return policy.
customer_reviews.author: MHaynes

customer_reviews.title: Short lifetime
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working completely about three weeks ago. Need to know how to contact someone regarding this because I really don't feel like it's fair for me to have to buy a new mower...
customer_reviews.author: Diana D.

customer_reviews.title: Good mower
customer_reviews.text: Only thing I noticed wrong was the blade kept hitting the inner side of the circle protective mount which I just took a hammer to bend it out a little
customer_reviews.author: thomas

customer_reviews.title: Flawless performance so far
customer_reviews.text: I am starting my second season with this mower, and have not had one single complaint.It has started on first pull every single time I have ever started it, even after spending the winter in the shed, when I took it out the other day, it fired right up on the first pull once again. No complaints for me, especially when you consider the price.
customer_reviews.author: RIchard L. Buse

product_meta.title: Yard Machines 140cc 20-Inch Push Mower
product_meta.description: Style:2017 EditionKeep your lawn looking great with the Yard Machines Push Mower. The Yard Machines 140cc 4-cycle push lawnmower is perfect for small to medium-sized residential yards and delivers solid, efficient power to tackle the job. Equipped with a 140cc OHV engine and a compact 20-inch frame, you will be able to maneuver around tight corners and shrubs easily. The manual height adjuster will allow you to adjust to three different mowing heights very easily. This push mower is lightweight, has a loop handle and durable 7-inch wheels. Item is not for sale in California.
feature_bullets: Powered by a durable 140cc OHV engine to get the job done quickly
Equipped with a 20" side discharge cutting deck. Height Adjustment- 1.25 to 3.75 inches
Features 3 cutting height positions that let you cut the grass down to the ideal size
Designed with 7 x 7-inch wheels on the front and rear for easy manuerverability

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars766 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
